mapper.select: select * from bang, store where bang.store_no = store.store_no and bang.bang_no = #{bang_no}

SELECT h.reserv_no, h.bang_no, b.bang_name, s.store_name, s.store_addr, s.store_tel, h.reserv_people, h.reserv_date, h.reserv_time FROM reservation_copy h, store s, bang b WHERE h.bang_no = b.bang_no AND h.store_no = s.store_no AND bang_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reserv_no, bang_no, reserv_people, reserv_time, store_no, reserv_date, reserv_progress) values(seq_reserv_no.nextval, #{bang_no}, #{reserv_people}, #{reserv_time}, #{store_no}, #{reserv_date}, '예약대기')
